about_the_game:
Overview

In a collaboration between Tuxedo Esports and Rivals of Aether, you can now obtain the slickest Ranno that has set foot in Aether. After Tuxedo won our Esport Icon Contest, we worked with them to create this new skin. This skin features an entirely new set of sprites for Ranno!

Tuxedo Ranno

  • He fights without his patented poison sash in order to look more dapper.
  • He fires roses with thorns instead of poison darts.
  • He wears a tuxedo! Every sprite has been redrawn to feature a tuxedo!
  • When he taunts, he throws a rose! It reminds me of something...
detailed_description:
Overview

In a collaboration between Tuxedo Esports and Rivals of Aether, you can now obtain the slickest Ranno that has set foot in Aether. After Tuxedo won our Esport Icon Contest, we worked with them to create this new skin. This skin features an entirely new set of sprites for Ranno!

Tuxedo Ranno

  • He fights without his patented poison sash in order to look more dapper.
  • He fires roses with thorns instead of poison darts.
  • He wears a tuxedo! Every sprite has been redrawn to feature a tuxedo!
  • When he taunts, he throws a rose! It reminds me of something...
name: Rivals of Aether: Tuxedo Ranno

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Rivals of Aether: Tuxedo Ranno

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A Premium Skin for Ranno. This skin comes with a full new set of sprites of Ranno in a tuxedo along with new visual effects and a rose-tossing taunt.
